casebody.data:
PHILIP J. GALFO, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. TOWNSHIP OF ROCHELLE PARK AND WILLIAM MONTAGUE, DEFENDANTS-RESPONDENTS. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted April 1, 1980 Decided April 11, 1980.

Before Judges CRANE, MILMED and KING.

Richard J. Donohue, attorney for appellant: Skiba, Atkins & Eschwege, attorneys for respondent (Jay R. Atkins, on the brief). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed essentially for the reasons expressed by Judge Smith in his opinion reported at 166 N.J.Super. 117 (Law Div.1979).
